About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

Er. Narayan Shaw

Information Technology

Web Developer & Designer

Hi! I'm Narayan. I am an IT engineer and freelancing full stack web developer, living in Asansol, West Bengal, India. I spend my days with my hands in many different areas of web development from back end programming (Node js, PHP, Django/Python, Ruby on Rails) to front end design (HTML, CSS jQuery/JavaScript and frameworks), digital accessibility, user experience and visual design.

I'm Google certified Digital Marketar and extremely passionate about web development and design in all it's forms and helping small businesses and artisans build and improve their online presence. Aside from web development, I enjoy spending my time with my family and friends, brewing beer, taking photos and playing Computers Games.
